snippet: Security forces again fired tear gas and arrested demonstrators in Bahrain's capital on Friday, as protesters renewed their calls for reform and the release of political prisoners.
abstract: Security forces again fired tear gas and arrested demonstrators in Bahrain's capital on Friday, as protesters renewed their calls for reform and the release of political prisoners.

byline.original: By CHRISTINE HAUSER and ROBERT MACKEY

headline.main: Bahraini Activists Document Crackdown on Protest
